charges.charge_description: 21:841A=NP.F - NARCOTICS - POSSESSION (possession with intent to distribute crack cocaine)(5)

charges.charge_disposition: Incarceration: 140 months; Supervised Release: 4 years with following special conditions: drug testing, drug aftercare treatment and 150 hours of community service in lieu of paying a fine; fine and cost of imprisonment waived; $100 special assessment due immediately; remanded to custody of marshal and the court will recommend to the Bureau of Prisons that the defendant receive drug treatment and that he be allowed to serve his sentence in Coleman, Florida

charges.charge_description: 21:846=ND.F - CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE NARCOTICS (conspiracy to possess with intent to distribute crack cocaine)(1)
21:841A=NP.F - NARCOTICS - POSSESSION (possession with intent to distribute crack cocaine)(2-4)
conspiracy to possess with intent to distribute and to distribute 50 grams or more of cocaine base, in violation of Title 21, United States code, Sections 846 and 841(b)(1)(A)(iii)
